sect2.title: Installation of Coreutils
sect2.para: This package has a test suite available which can perform a number of checks to ensure it built correctly. Should you choose to run it, the following command will do so:
The meaning of the make option:

listitem.para: RUN_EXPENSIVE_TESTS=yes: This tells the test suite to run several additional tests that are considered relatively expensive on some platforms. However, they are generally not a problem on Linux.
